thread.title: Tracked Down: Eliza Dushku, Tom Brady, Tavis Smiley and more...
thread.title_full: Tracked Down: Eliza Dushku, Tom Brady, Tavis Smiley and more... | Boston Herald

author: Inside Track
title: Tracked Down: Eliza Dushku, Tom Brady, Tavis Smiley and more...
text: Tracked Down: Eliza Dushku, Tom Brady, Tavis Smiley and more... Inside Track Monday, October 26, 2015 Eliza Dushku at the annual UnMask Cancer event to benefit The Jimmy Fund. comments Tweet Watertown actress Eliza Dushku and Fox 25 ’s Sarah Wroblewski partying with more than 250 masked guests at the annual UnMask Cancer event at District Hall in the Seaport that featured an electric violinist, an airbrush mask artist, a light-up dance floor and the Tufts University Spirit of Color neon dancers and raised more than $200,000 for T he Jimmy Fund ... Tom Brady and Gisele Bundchen touring the oh-so-fancy Shady Hill private school in Cambridge for son Benjamin , 5, who will start first grade next year ... India Hicks , the former model-turned-designer and goddaughter of Britian’s Prince Charles , hitting Daniela Corte on Newbury Street for a pop-up shop featuring her designs ... Talk-show host and bestselling author Tavis Smiley wowing the students with his kickoff talk for Bunker Hill Community College ’s annual Compelling Conversations speaker series ...
